short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically formats JSON content in tabs with customizable themes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JSON Viewer Plus is a powerful Chrome extension designed for developers, data analysts, and anyone who works with JSON data. Whether you're debugging APIs, analyzing JSON files, or just need a more readable format, JSON Viewer Plus provides the ultimate toolkit.

Key Features:

- 20+ Themes: Customize your viewing experience with over 20 themes to choose from, tailored for different preferences and environments.
- Formatter: Automatically format data for easy reading, turning raw into a clean and organized structure.
- Highlighter: Syntax highlighting that makes it easier to identify different elements in your data, ensuring you never miss a detail.
- Auto-Detect Content: Automatically detects and formats data in any active browser tab, saving you time and effort.
- Timestamp Addition: Add timestamps to your data for accurate debugging and time tracking.
- Automatic Line Numbers: Line numbers are added automatically, making it easier to navigate and reference specific parts of your data.
- Clickable Links: All properties containing URLs are automatically converted into clickable links, streamlining your workflow.
- Fold/Unfold Objects & Arrays: Easily fold or unfold JSON objects and arrays to focus on the parts you need, helping you manage complex structures.
- Array Size Display: Instantly see the size of any array, allowing for quicker data insights.
- Configurable Indentation: Choose between spaces or tabs for indentation, with customizable levels to suit your coding style.
- JSONPath Display: Hover over any element to see its JSONPath, providing a clear reference for your data structure.
- HTTP Headers Display: View HTTP headers directly alongside your data, offering additional context for API debugging.
